item.title: Strawberry Chia Jam
item.description: You might wonder why, Strawberry Chia jam and not regular jam.

item.title: Tropical Green Smoothie
item.description: Don’t let the mighty green coloured drink intimidate you. Green smoothies are one of the best ways to boost your energy in the morning – especially a vegan green smoothie.
